detectors.description: Crowdsale.buyTokens(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ICOCrowdsale.sol#378-395) ignores return value by token.approve(this,tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ICOCrowdsale.sol#390)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ICOCrowdsale.sol#378-395):
	External calls:
	- token.approve(this,tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ICOCrowdsale.sol#390)
	- token.transferFrom(this,beneficiary,tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ICOCrowdsale.sol#391)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- TokenPurchase(msg.sender,beneficiary,weiAmount,tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ICOCrowdsale.sol#392)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Crowdsale.buyTokens(address)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ICOCrowdsale.sol#L378-L395):
	External calls:
	- [token.approve(this,tokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ICOCrowdsale.sol#L390)
	- [token.transferFrom(this,beneficiary,tokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ICOCrowdsale.sol#L391)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [TokenPurchase(msg.sender,beneficiary,weiAmount,tokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ICOCrowdsale.sol#L392)

detectors.description:
Crowdsale.validPurchase() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ICOCrowdsale.sol#404-408) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- withinPeriod = now >= startTime && now <= endTime (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ICOCrowdsale.sol#405)
	- withinPeriod && nonZeroPurchase (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ICOCrowdsale.sol#407)
detectors.markdown:
[Crowdsale.validPurchase()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ICOCrowdsale.sol#L404-L408) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [withinPeriod = now >= startTime && now <= endTime](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ICOCrowdsale.sol#L405)
	- [withinPeriod && nonZeroPurchase](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ICOCrowdsale.sol#L407)

detectors.description:
CappedCrowdsale.triggerCircuitBreaker() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ICOCrowdsale.sol#452-455) compares to a boolean constant:
	-require(bool)(circuitBreaker == false) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ICOCrowdsale.sol#453)
